info.title: Attom Data Solutions API
info.description: ATTOM empowers customers with better property data. We warehouse property data nationwide with myriad data points on each parcel including ownership information, lat/long, square footage, loan types, sales history, sales comps, crime, schools and more.

get.summary: Returns a list of properties that fit a criteria.
get.description: Get a list of property IDs within a specific geography that have a specific number of beds. Use orderby to choose how you want your results sorted.

parameters.name: geoid
parameters.description: A list of geographies that this property belongs to. These geoIDs are used by search engine and values should not be exposed to the public.

parameters.name: minBeds
parameters.description: The min Bed size to search from.

parameters.name: maxBeds
parameters.description: The max Bed size to search from.

get.summary: Returns property details based on an ID.
get.description: Get property details based on its Onboard property ID.

get.summary: Returns properties within a zip code.
get.description: Get a list of properties within a zip code. Use propertytype and order by to narrow down your results.

parameters.name: postalcode
parameters.description: The zip code or postal code to search

parameters.name: propertytype
parameters.description: A specific property classification such as 'Detached Single Family'

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The current view index based on the pagesize and the total number of records available

parameters.name: pagesize
parameters.description: The number of records to be returned with the request

parameters.name: address1
parameters.description: The first line of the mailing address

parameters.name: address2
parameters.description: The second line of the mailing address

get.summary: Returns properties and their characteristics that fit a criteria.
get.description: Get a list of property snapshots within a specific city that are within a desired size range and a specific property type.

parameters.name: cityname
parameters.description: The name of the city to search from

parameters.name: minLotSize1
parameters.description: The min Lot size 1 to search from

parameters.name: maxLotSize1
parameters.description: The max Lot size 1 to search from

parameters.name: propertytype
parameters.description: A specific property classification such as 'Detached Single Family'

parameters.name: mintaxamt
parameters.description: The total amount of taxes paid to the local taxing authority

parameters.name: maxtaxamt
parameters.description: The total amount of taxes paid to the local taxing authority

parameters.name: postalcode
parameters.description: The zip code or postal code to search

get.summary: Returns basic property information and most recent transaction and taxes.
get.description: Get basic property information and most recent transaction and taxes for a specific attom id.

get.summary: Returns detailed property information and most recent transaction and taxes.
get.description: Get a detailed property information and most recent transaction and taxes for a specific address.

parameters.name: address1
parameters.description: The first line of the mailing address

parameters.name: address2
parameters.description: The second line of the mailing address

get.summary: Return schools within the attendance boundary of a property.
get.description: Search for a property to have the property details returned, along with the schools in the associated attendance zones.

get.summary: Return all schools within a defined radius from a point.
get.description: Search for all schools that are located within a given radius around a given latitude and longitude.

parameters.name: filetypetext
parameters.description: The type of school (public, private, or catholic can be selected)

get.summary: Return details about a particular school.
get.description: Search by school ID to return all of the available details about a school

get.summary: Return details about a particular school district.
get.description: Search by district number to return all of the available details about a school district

get.summary: Returns all the events that have occurred on a specific address.
get.description: Get a detail of all the events on a specific property based on its address.

parameters.name: address1
parameters.description: The first line of the mailing address

parameters.name: address2
parameters.description: The second line of the mailing address

get.summary: Returns property details mortgage based on ID.
get.description: Get property details mortgage based on its Onboard property ID.

parameters.name: address1
parameters.description: The first line of the mailing address

parameters.name: address2
parameters.description: The second line of the mailing address

get.summary: Returns property details owner based on an ID.
get.description: Get property details owner based on its Onboard property ID.

parameters.name: address1
parameters.description: The first line of the mailing address

parameters.name: address2
parameters.description: The second line of the mailing address

get.summary: Returns property details mortgageowner based on an ID.
get.description: Get property details mortgageowner based on its Onboard property ID.

parameters.name: address1
parameters.description: The first line of the mailing address

parameters.name: address2
parameters.description: The second line of the mailing address

get.summary: Returns assessment details for properties within a radius.
get.description: Get snapshots of the properties within a radius of a property that have a total market value within a specified range.

parameters.name: address1
parameters.description: The first line of the mailing address

parameters.name: address2
parameters.description: The second line of the mailing address

parameters.name: minmktttlvalue
parameters.description: The estimated total market value from the local taxing authority

parameters.name: maxmktttlvalue
parameters.description: The estimated total market value from the local taxing authority

get.summary: Returns assessment details for properties within a zip code.
get.description: Get assessment details for properties within a zip code. Use propertytpe to select a specific property type for your search.

parameters.name: postalcode
parameters.description: The zip code or postal code to search

parameters.name: propertytype
parameters.description: A specific property classification such as 'Detached Single Family'

get.summary: Returns assessment history and property details.
get.description: Get a full detail of property characteristics and assessment history information for a specific property.

get.summary: Returns AVM details within a geography.
get.description: Get a list of AVM snapshot records that fall within an Onboard GeoID with a specific value range. Use propertytpe to select a specific property type for your search.

parameters.name: geoid
parameters.description: A list of geographies that this property belongs to. These geoIDs are used by search engine and values should not be exposed to the public.

parameters.name: propertytype
parameters.description: A specific property classification such as 'Detached Single Family'

get.summary: Returns AVM details for a property.
get.description: Get AVM details for a specific address.

parameters.name: address1
parameters.description: The first line of the mailing address

parameters.name: address2
parameters.description: The second line of the mailing address

get.summary: Returns the Attomized AVM and other property details .
get.description: Get Attomized AVM and other property details for a specific address.

get.summary: Returns home sale information for properties within a geography.
get.description: Get a list of home sale snapshots within a Onboard GeoID that sold within a date range and specified sale amount.

parameters.name: geoid
parameters.description: A list of geographies that this property belongs to. These geoIDs are used by search engine and values should not be exposed to the public.

parameters.name: minsaleamt
parameters.description: The recorded amount of the sale transaction

parameters.name: maxsaleamt
parameters.description: The recorded amount of the sale transaction

parameters.name: startsalesearchdate
parameters.description: The standardized date for search purposes

parameters.name: endsalesearchdate
parameters.description: The standardized date for search purposes

parameters.name: address1
parameters.description: The first line of the mailing address

parameters.name: address2
parameters.description: The second line of the mailing address

parameters.name: propertytype
parameters.description: A specific property classification such as 'Detached Single Family'

get.summary: Returns sale information for a property.
get.description: Get sales information for a specific address.

parameters.name: address1
parameters.description: The first line of the mailing address

parameters.name: address2
parameters.description: The second line of the mailing address

get.summary: Returns sales history for a property.
get.description: Get a sales history snapshot of a property based on an Onboard property ID.

get.summary: Returns basic transaction and loan history on a property.
get.description: Get the basic transaction and loan history on a property for a specific address.

parameters.name: address1
parameters.description: The first line of the mailing address

parameters.name: address2
parameters.description: The second line of the mailing address

get.summary: Returns detailed transaction, pre-foreclosure and loan history on a property.
get.description: Get the detailed transaction, pre-foreclosure and loan history on a property for a specific address.

parameters.name: address1
parameters.description: The first line of the mailing address

parameters.name: address2
parameters.description: The second line of the mailing address

get.summary: Returns sales history for a property.
get.description: Get a sales history snapshot of a property based on an address.

parameters.name: address1
parameters.description: The first line of the mailing address

parameters.name: address2
parameters.description: The second line of the mailing address

get.summary: Returns sales trends for a given zip code in yearly intervals
get.description: Get the average sale price, median sale price, and count of sales for the past 2 years in yearly intervals.

parameters.name: geoid
parameters.description: A list of geographies that this property belongs to. These geoIDs are used by search engine and values should not be exposed to the public.

parameters.name: startyear
parameters.description: The start year to search from

parameters.name: endyear
parameters.description: The end year to search from

parameters.name: startmonth
parameters.description: The start month to search from

parameters.name: endmonth
parameters.description: The end month to search from

get.summary: Returns all boundaries a point falls within.
get.description: This method allows you to pass a latitude and longitude point and geo type to retrieve a list of geographies that point falls within. Required input is a valid WKT (Well Known Text) point.

get.summary: Returns POIs based on zip code.
get.description: This search returns a list of Points of Interest in proximity to the centroid of a zip code.

get.summary: Returns POIs based on point.
get.description: This search returns a list of POI in proximity to a latitude/longitude.

parameters.name: BusinessCategory
parameters.description: This is Business Category as per Lookup separated by pipe '|'

get.summary: Returns POIs based on an address.
get.description: This search returns a list of POI in proximity to an address.

get.summary: Returns business categories.
get.description: This lookup is used to obtain a full list of Business Categories.

get.summary: Returns lines of business categories.
get.description: This lookup can be used to show the full list of Lines of Businesses (LOB), and which categories they belong to.

get.summary: Returns community information.
get.description: This search returns community information for a specific geography.

parameters.name: AreaId
parameters.description: This is the Area ID to search

get.summary: Returns available data fields.
get.description: This lookup returns the full list of over 375 data fields that are available in the Community API.
